ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 1/3" Sony Effio CCD, Color DSP, Automatic CDS Sensor
Weatherproof housing for outdoor indoor application. Water, dust and crush resistant glass coating
Horizontal Resolution: 700 TV Lines. NTSC System
Build-in f3.6mm wide angle Lens. 28 IR leds for night vision. Mini Illumination: 0 Lux (IR LED ON)
Package included: 2 of Effio Sony CCD cameras, 2 of power supplies and 2 of security warning decals
